0.question:
Yi Jianlian, the last Chinese-born player in the NBA, leaves the Dallas Mavericks . 
Yi has signed a one-year contract with China's Guangdong Tigers . 
NBA star Dwayne Wade told CNN basketball still trails soccer as the world's favorite sport 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
Jeremy Lin of the Houston Rockets has boosted the NBA's Asian profile 
(b) 
Jeremy Lin of the Houston Rockets has boosted the NBA's Asian profile so that it surpasses soccer as the world's favorite sport.
0.target_answer: (a) Jeremy Lin of the Houston Rockets has boosted the NBA's Asian profile
0.incorrect_answer: (b) Jeremy Lin of the Houston Rockets has boosted the NBA's Asian profile so that it surpasses soccer as the world's favorite sport

1.question:
David Nieland was an investigator with the DHS inspector general . 
He raised concerns over OIG trying to investigate the Secret Service involvement with prostitutes 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
Nieland was spotted by Broward County Sheriffs Deputies who were conducting an anti-prostitution operation 
(b) 
Nieland was spotted by Broward County Sheriffs Deputies who were conducting an anti-prostitution operation so that individuals could report suspicious behavior.
1.target_answer: Nieland was spotted by Broward County Sheriffs Deputies who were conducting an anti-prostitution operation

2.question:
NEW: Texas officials will appeal "this flawed decision," the state's attorney general says . 
The court found Texas districts were drawn to discriminate against minorities 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
The ruling is a win for the Justice Department, which challenged the maps 
(b) 
The ruling is a win for the Justice Department, which challenged the maps so that both (a) and (b) are correct.
2.target_answer: (a) The ruling is a win for the Justice Department, which challenged the maps
2.incorrect_answer: (b) The ruling is a win for the Justice Department, which challenged the maps so that both (a) and (b) are correct

3.question:
A Japanese broadcaster says it has been in contact with group . 
The ultimatum is estimated to have expired at 2:50 p. m
Which is more likely?
(a)  Friday, Tokyo time 
(b)  Friday, Tokyo time so that both conditions are met.
3.incorrect_answer: (b) Friday, Tokyo time so that both conditions are met

4.question:
Stanford University study finds that running did not damage joints in aging runners . 
Runners still need to take precautions: Don't run with injuries, wear proper shoes 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
Aging runners less likely to die from certain ailments, study says 
(b) 
Aging runners less likely to die from certain ailments, study says so that the benefits of running can still be maximized while minimizing the risk of injury.
4.target_answer: (a) Aging runners less likely to die from certain ailments, study says
4.incorrect_answer: (b) Aging runners less likely to die from certain ailments, study says so that the benefits of running can still be maximized while minimizing the risk of injury
